text: Christina Aguilera is one of the best vocalists in the pop music industry, but her record breaking success has been tainted by her tumultuous personal life. Her two and a half year relationship with Matthew Rutler appears to be solid and happy, but Star magazine claims that this is only smoke and mirrors. A source reveals, “ Their relationship is convenient. It was always casual, very on and off, and not something Christina saw a future in. ” The magazine further alleges that Aguilera is “ ready for a new man ” and that she ’ s “ already on the prowl for a replacement. ” Aguilera ’ s temporary departure from The Voice signaled a massive change in her career.
